languages.text: "Да, Темный. Все это время. С каждым новым переходом я скрепляла свой дух все сильнее, а медитация духа отгоняла мороки Той, Что Жаждет, все лучше. Я прошла через это. Пройдешь и ты — если тебе дорога твоя душа".

traits.locale_text: "Да, Темный. Все это время. С каждым новым переходом я скрепляла свой дух все сильнее, а медитация духа отгоняла мороки Той, Что Жаждет, все лучше. Я прошла через это. Пройдешь и ты — если тебе дорога твоя душа".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."
languages.original_text: "Да, Темный. Все это время. С каждым новым переходом я скрепляла свой дух все сильнее, а медитация духа отгоняла мороки Той, Что Жаждет, все лучше. Я прошла через это. Пройдешь и ты — если тебе дорога твоя душа".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new traversal, I emboldened my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I passed through it. So will you, if you value your soul."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new traversal, I emboldened my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I passed through it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, Eldar noir. Depuis le début. À chaque nouveau saut, mon esprit s'est aguerri et ma méditation s'est faite plus profonde, jusqu'à former un rempart contre les assauts tentaculaires de l'Assoiffée. J'ai résisté. Et vous résisterez aussi, si vous tenez à conserver votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Eldar noir. Depuis le début. À chaque nouveau saut, mon esprit s'est aguerri et ma méditation s'est faite plus profonde, jusqu'à former un rempart contre les assauts tentaculaires de l'Assoiffée. J'ai résisté. Et vous résisterez aussi, si vous tenez à conserver votre âme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そう、闇の者だ。この間ずっと。新たな一節ごとに、我は自分の精神をさらに強化し、瞑想はかの渇きたる女の蔓に対して、より強い障壁となった。我はそれに耐えた。魂を大切にすれば、お前もそうなるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: 「そう、闇の者だ。この間ずっと。新たな一節ごとに、我は自分の精神をさらに強化し、瞑想はかの渇きたる女の蔓に対して、より強い障壁となった。我はそれに耐えた。魂を大切にすれば、お前もそうなるだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，黑暗子嗣，我一直都在忍受这种感觉。每穿越一次面纱，我的精神就增强一分，我的冥想也会变得更加牢不可破，足以将饥渴女士挡在外面。这一切我都忍受下来了，如果你在乎你的灵魂，你也应该这么做。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，黑暗子嗣，我一直都在忍受这种感觉。每穿越一次面纱，我的精神就增强一分，我的冥想也会变得更加牢不可破，足以将饥渴女士挡在外面。这一切我都忍受下来了，如果你在乎你的灵魂，你也应该这么做。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, Dunkler. Die ganze Zeit über. Mit jeder neuen Reise habe ich meinen Geist besser gewappnet und meine Meditation ist zu einer stärkeren Barriere gegen die Tentakel von Ihr, die dürstet, geworden. Ich habe es ertragen. Und das werdet Ihr auch, wenn Euch Eure Seele etwas wert ist."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Dunkler. Die ganze Zeit über. Mit jeder neuen Reise habe ich meinen Geist besser gewappnet und meine Meditation ist zu einer stärkeren Barriere gegen die Tentakel von Ihr, die dürstet, geworden. Ich habe es ertragen. Und das werdet Ihr auch, wenn Euch Eure Seele etwas wert ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, oscuro. Todo el tiempo. Con cada letanía, mi espíritu se fortalecía aún más y mi meditación se convertía en una barrera contra los tentáculos de la Sedienta. Yo lo soporté. Y tú también lo harás, si en algo valoras tu alma».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, oscuro. Todo el tiempo. Con cada letanía, mi espíritu se fortalecía aún más y mi meditación se convertía en una barrera contra los tentáculos de la Sedienta. Yo lo soporté. Y tú también lo harás, si en algo valoras tu alma».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Evet Kara. Bunca zaman. Her geçişte ruhumu daha da korumaya aldım, meditasyonum da Susayan'ın tohumlarına karşı daha da güçlü bir set oldu. Dayandım. Ruhuna değer veriyorsan sen de dayanacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Dark One. This entire time. With each new passage, I bolstered my spirit further and my meditation became a stronger barrier against the tendrils of She Who Thirsts. I endured it. So will you, if you value your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Evet Kara. Bunca zaman boyunca. Her geçişte ruhumu daha da korumaya aldım ve meditasyonum, Susayan'ın tohumlarına karşı daha da güçlü bir bariyer hâline geldi. Dayandım. Ruhuna değer veriyorsan sen de dayanacaksın."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
